definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Only by being open and inclusive can a country prosper and can our continent prosper.
sentences.chinese: 只有开放兼容，国家才能富强，亚欧大陆才能兴旺。

sentences.english: I strongly believe that Hong Kong people love their country and want to see it prosper.
sentences.chinese: 我坚信，香港人都热爱祖国，希望国家昌盛富强。

sentences.english: To the prosperity of our great motherland and the wellbeing of its people of all ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 为伟大祖国的繁荣富强和各族人民的幸福安康。

sentences.english: The pursuit of openness and inclusiveness is the only way leading a country or a nation to strength and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 开放兼容是一个国家和民族走向繁荣富强的必由之路。

sentences.english: If everybody can do so, the ry will be rich and strong.
sentences.chinese: 如果人人都能这样做的话，国家必定富强。

sentences.english: Promoting economic prosperity is aimed at building a prosperous and powerful country.
sentences.chinese: 繁荣经济的目的，是为了建设一个富强的国家。

sentences.english: The old pawn shop is located in the FuQiang Street.
sentences.chinese: 清代年间此街有当铺，故富强街旧称典当街。

sentences.english: The primary aim of mercantilists was to achieve power and wealth for the state.
sentences.chinese: 重商主义者的首要目的是为了富强国家。

sentences.english: National purity would be restored and China would be strong again.
sentences.chinese: 民族将会变得纯净，中国将会再度富强。

sentences.english: The opening is also reforms, only then opens compatibly , the country can be prosperous and powerful.
sentences.chinese: 开放也是改革，只有开放兼容，国家才能富强。

sentences.english: I want to be friends with you, but I can't tell you my company name now.
sentences.chinese: 我企盼丰城能走向繁荣富强，因为我是丰城人。

sentences.english: Thank you for contribution to China's flourishing and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 非常感谢您对中国的繁荣富强做出的贡献。

sentences.english: The well-being of a society is enhanced when many of its people questi on authority.
sentences.chinese: 当许多公民质疑权威的时候，社会才能更富强。

sentences.english: China in 2038 will be the most powerful and richest country on Earth.
sentences.chinese: 到2038年，中国将成为世界上最富强的国家。

sentences.english: If everybody can do so, the country will be rich and strong (powerful).
sentences.chinese: 如果人人都能这样做的话，国家必定富强。

definition: lit. rich country, strong army (idiom); slogan of legalist philosophers in pre-Han times/Make the country wealthy and the military powerful, slogan of modernizers in Qing China and Meiji Japan (Japanese pronunciation: Fukoku kyōhei)
state of Wei (c. 1040-209 BC), vassal of Zhou
efficient government, people at peace (idiom); all is well with the state and the people
Heping district of Shenyang city 瀋陽市|沈阳市, Liaoning/Hoping township in Taichung county 臺中縣|台中县[Tai2 zhong1 xian4], Taiwan
to found a country/nation-building/the foundation of PRC by Mao Zedong in 1949
Xingguo county in Ganzhou 贛州|赣州, Jiangxi
